price: 43. Ya soló, biso nde topesaka bomoyi mpe liwa, mpe epai na biso bozongi ekozala.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
